Articles.Content:
After a quick search of the forums, I realised that there where no threads about drawing outside of fan-art, and if they where, they were long dead, so i decided to start up a new thread.

Post all you drawings, (within forum rules of course.)

I will start with 2 I have drawn over the last 2 days in GIMP, and 1 in paint, after a found a tablet and pen in my dads roof.

To start, we have "Final duel over the Reich, which takes place in late 1945, and involves the end to a duel between 2 aces, with the German Fw-190D-9 falling to the P-51D, it took me roughly 2 days in GIMP.

Second we have the extremely creatively named C47+Waco, which was a simple 1 hour pixelated drawing of a Waco glider and a crashing C-47 transport, also made in GIMP.

Finally we have "Over Enemy Territory", which was made over 2-3 hours in Paint, it involves a fictitious USAF jet being shot down over enemy territory, with the pilot ejecting.

WARNING, BIG PIC, (don't know how to do spoilers, sorry.)

The Images have been placed in order of latest to first.

Post more drawings below on any subject(again, within forum rules.)

Edited December 13, 2014 by qwertyx2y
Spelling.

Would people please tell me what they think about my drawings.

(And post your own please:))
Not bad. Certainly a darn sight better than anything I could do.

bit of a bump, but i finished 3 other drawings, and thought I would show them + my IOS stuff.,

first is 'Nuclear Launch' and features 2 mirage IIIs and a fictious russian attacker.

second is 'cold dark sea' and features a fictitious German ww1 seaplane destroying a submarine.

and lastly, my overall favourite, (i also just finished it) is Suicide Run (I was out of ideas for name) and features a F6F Hellcat and F4U Corsair falling to a Japanese cruisers cannons.

My IOS stuff is both KSP related, so i will put them in fanart, also, i don't want to have a overly long post (well, Overly Longer)
